I bought this pretty much just for Weekend at Bernie's since I couldn't find the movie by itself, but who doesn't love Revenge of the Nerds and Porky's also? Great movies overall.

Classic.
All four  movie in one divine DVD package.

This is a great bargain for fans of the raunchy 80's comedies. Not a bad movie in the bunch. They all hold up pretty well too. For folks who didn't grow up in the 80's, if you can get past the hair and fashion of that wonderful period of history, you will probably enjoy the movies as well. I highly recommend this DVD.
Movies from my youth. The comedy still holds up after all these years.
Blast from the Past
Great!
These are the funniest movies to watch, I just wish I could find all of the Porkys movies
Ordered it for Porkys but All th movies are great
Still hilarious, and Weekend at Bernie's BY ITSELF cost more than this entire package. A good buy and a great gift.
Great movies fast delivery. Everything was great.
DVDs were in perfect condition! These are great movies and I'm glad I got them all in an affordable pack!

This was four great classic movies and it arrived on time and good shape. Porky's and weekend at Bernie s will keep you laughing all the time the movies are very funny and not for children nudity are in all of them and they do show everything not blackouts or shaded areas.

Individually it's debatable whether these movies are worth the price, but in a set like this?  At this price?  Forget about it.  Just do it.  Takes up a fourth of the room on your shelf and for some of us these are classic films that still make us laugh.
